name: Kangaroonaut
description:
Controls:
  • Space: "Jump"
  • ESC: "Exit game" or "Return to Menu"
Game Description:

Jump from planet to planet and avoid black holes. Use gravity for cool maneuvers!

More Info:

Made by K13(Solo Game Developer) in 4 days. I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it. Stay tuned for new features and updates!

Here are the tools I used:

  • Unity Engine 2019.2
  • Jetbrains Rider
  • Blender
  • Paint.NET
  • Bosca Ceoil
